name: Apple
description: A sweet, crunchy fruit often red or green in color. Commonly eaten raw or in desserts.

name: Banana
description: A soft, sweet fruit with a yellow peel and high potassium content. Popular snack or smoothie ingredient.

name: Orange
description: A juicy citrus fruit known for its bright orange color and high vitamin C content.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, red fruit with seeds on the outside. Sweet and juicy, often used in desserts.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with spiky skin and sweet, tangy yellow flesh. Common in juices and fruit salads.
